channel.title: comics on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in comics on Konigi

item.title: How to Understand Your Users with Personas
item.description: Brad Colbow and Indi Young explain personas using comics on Carsonified. http://carsonified.com/blog/design/how-to-understand-your-users-with-personas/

item.title: Google Chrome Comic Book
item.description: Google explains it's new open source, Webkit-based Chrome Web Browser with a 28 page comic book inked by Scott McCloud. The Chrome browser beta becomes available to Windows users on September 2, 2008. Mac and Linux versions are also planned. http://www.google.com/googlebooks/chrome/
